name: Food Delivery Price Intelligence API
description: Restaurant search, menu prices, and cross-platform price comparison from DoorDash, Uber Eats, and Grubhub via mobile proxy. Compare delivery fees and menu prices across platforms.
longDescription: Compare food delivery prices across DoorDash, Uber Eats, and Grubhub in real-time. Search restaurants by name or cuisine, extract full menu pricing, and compare the same restaurant's prices across multiple platforms. Essential for consumers, restaurant operators, and market researchers. Mobile proxies bypass platform-specific geo-restrictions and anti-scraping.
whyMobileProxy: Food delivery platforms (DoorDash, Uber Eats, Grubhub) use location-based content that varies by delivery address. Datacenter IPs receive generic or blocked responses. Mobile carrier IPs appear as real app users in specific locations, providing accurate local restaurant data, delivery fees, and menu prices that match what consumers actually see. This is critical for accurate price comparison.

search.restaurants: Restaurant[] — name, platform, rating, deliveryFee, deliveryTime, priceRange, cuisine, url, address

menu.menu: { items: MenuItem[] — name, price, description, category, modifiers[] }

compare.platforms: PlatformPrice[] — platform, deliveryFee, serviceFee, menuPrices: { item, price }[], totalForSameOrder

vs.name: DoorDash API (Merchant)
vs.limitation: Only for registered merchants, not consumer-facing data

vs.name: Apify Food Scraper
vs.limitation: Single platform only, no cross-platform comparison

vs.name: Manual comparison
vs.limitation: Time-consuming, not automatable, no API access

competitive.ourAdvantage: Cross-platform comparison (DoorDash + Uber Eats + Grubhub) in one API at $0.02-0.03/request. No partnerships needed. Real-time pricing. No monthly commitment.

limitations: Delivery availability and pricing varies by exact delivery address
Menu items may vary between platforms for the same restaurant
Rate limited to 20 proxy requests/minute per client IP
Promotional pricing and coupons not captured

/api/run?type=search.description: Search restaurants by name/cuisine and location across platforms

/api/run?type=menu.description: Get full menu with prices from a specific restaurant

/api/run?type=compare.description: Compare same restaurant's prices across DoorDash, Uber Eats, Grubhub
